Name: [Freeze] Freezing Gun
Desc: Upon triggering <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, the Agent inflicts additional Daze equal to <color=#2BAD00>200%</color> of their initial Impact on the target, if the target is not Stunned.
Desc2: This deadly weapon can produce shards of ice and shoot at great distances. Think twice before using it, even in the summer.
